Column.name: Description
Column.value: System will display in a specified format

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: Information will be displayed in a particular way

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: The system must meet some performance criteria

Column.name: Notes
Column.value: The system will allow the user(s) to print out some artifact as required by the specification.

Column.name: Description

Column.name: Notes
